formalpara.title: Figure 2
formalpara.para: A pairwise alignment of TBA-1 and TBB-1 with dominant alleles and secondary structure. Genetically defined dominant, semi-dominant, and/or gain of function alleles are shown in red and underlined if they have been independently discovered more than once (Table 1). Colored α-helices (cylinders) and β-ribbons (arrows) as in Figure 1 are shown below the primary structure.
